hero.title: Empowering Communities Through Development
hero.subtitle: Building sustainable futures for rural communities in Kenya through education, healthcare, and economic empowerment programs.

education.title: Education & Skills Development
education.description: Providing quality education and vocational training to empower individuals with knowledge and skills.

health.title: Healthcare Access
health.description: Improving healthcare access and promoting wellness in underserved communities.

agriculture.title: Sustainable Agriculture
agriculture.description: Supporting farmers with modern techniques and resources for sustainable food security.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To empower communities through sustainable development programs that promote education, healthcare access, and economic opportunities while preserving local culture and environment.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: A world where every community has access to quality education, healthcare, and economic opportunities to build prosperous and sustainable futures.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Comprehensive development programs addressing the root causes of poverty

education.title: Education & Skills Development
education.description: We believe education is the foundation of sustainable development.

health.title: Healthcare & Wellness
health.description: Ensuring communities have access to quality healthcare services.

economic.title: Economic Empowerment
economic.description: Creating sustainable income opportunities for community members.

agriculture.title: Sustainable Agriculture
agriculture.description: Supporting food security through improved agricultural practices.

footer.description: Empowering communities through sustainable development programs.
